title: What is xx Network?
description: xx Network is the secure and efficient decentralized ecosystem of the future. The network combines xx Chain protocol with the privacy-protecting xx cMix technology to power a full suite of cutting-edge tech. The result is the first efficient online platform that allows you to quickly and securely communicate and exchange digital currencies on your smartphone without risking the safety of your metadata. While many messaging platforms are encrypted, no one protects your metadata the way we do. Read more about the xx Network in our designated whitepaper.
